title: What are some examples of health education activities at the community level? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Roksana, I work/volunteer as a health promotion officer in the community and I usually start by: Explaining why you should care about the health of your fellow man - A healthier society spend less of health care.Why you should care about your own health - perspectives on personal health practices.Why prevention is better than cure.Lifestyle factors that contribute to health.Managing risk factors that contribute to poor health outcomes.Neglected aspects of community health - mental health, sensory deficits etc.I find it is very important to also make sure that you connect with your audience. Consider their level of education, health literacy and age to make the health promotion activities more applicable and relevant.
